awards.text: Nominated for 5 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Contemporary rethinking of the legendary Broadway musical and 1962 film, updated to reflect a few early twenty-first-century sensibilities: A masterful con artist tries to bilk a staid Midwestern community, with unexpected results.

title: The Music Man
